title: Adult Supervision Required
text: Always use fireworks under adult supervision. Keep children at safe distance during display.

title: Safe Distance
text: Maintain minimum 5-10 meters distance from fireworks. Never throw or aim fireworks at people or animals.

title: Fire Safety
text: Keep a water bucket or fire extinguisher nearby. Never use fireworks near flammable materials or in dry conditions.

title: Burn Prevention
text: Wear proper clothing. Avoid loose fabrics. Keep hands and face away from burning fireworks. Never re-ignite a dud.

title: Hearing Protection
text: Use earplugs for high-noise fireworks. Protect children's ears from loud bursts.

title: Legal Compliance
text: Check local laws and regulations before purchasing and using fireworks. Follow local timing and area restrictions.

title: Wind Conditions
text: Avoid using fireworks in strong winds. Sparks can travel unpredictably in windy conditions.

title: Daytime Safety
text: Use fireworks in open areas away from buildings, trees, and dry grass. Daytime displays are generally safer.
